subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan had 30 points and 15 rebounds and Michael Finley hit a pivotal 3-pointer for the San Antonio Spurs with 22.6 seconds left to clinch a 94-91 victory against the visiting Nets on Friday.
snippet: Tim Duncan had 30 points and 15 rebounds and Michael Finley hit a pivotal 3-pointer for the San Antonio Spurs with 22.6 seconds left to clinch a 94-91 victory against the visiting Nets on Friday.
